Title: GraphicsFramework.Net - Canvas for GDI, WPF, Silverlight and Windows Phone 7
Description: GraphicsFramework.Net is a device independent graphics framework which can be use to create canvas for GDI, WPF, Silverlight and Windows Phone 7. Development of graphic applications will become easier and faster. It's developed in C# using Portable Class Libraries.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
GraphicsFramework.Net is a device independent graphics framework which can be use to create canvas for GDI, WPF, Silverlight and Windows Phone 7. Development of graphic applications will become easier and faster. It's developed in C# using Portable Class Libraries.
